name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019
description: Much more than just a train driving simulator. Build, drive and operate the railroad of your dreams with Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel i7 or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 GB available space
